stories.title: Initialize Laravel project with Jetstream (Livewire stack)
stories.description: Set up fresh Laravel installation with Jetstream using Livewire stack, configure SQLite database, and install Tailwind CSS dependencies.
acceptance: Laravel 11.x installed via composer create-project
Jetstream installed with Livewire stack: php artisan jetstream:install livewire
SQLite database configured in .env: DB_CONNECTION=sqlite
Database file created: database/database.sqlite
Run migrations: php artisan migrate
Tailwind CSS configured in tailwind.config.js
NPM dependencies installed: npm install && npm run build
Test server runs successfully: php artisan serve
Jetstream auth pages accessible: /login, /register, /dashboard

stories.title: Configure base layout components with monochrome design
stories.description: Create reusable layout components (app-layout, app-header, app-sidebar) following monochrome design system with proper Tailwind classes.
acceptance: Layout file: resources/views/layouts/app-layout.blade.php with header and sidebar slots
Header component: resources/views/components/app-header.blade.php with bg-white shadow-sm
Sidebar component: resources/views/components/app-sidebar.blade.php with bg-gray-50
Header includes: logo, user menu dropdown with text-gray-900
Sidebar uses: text-gray-600 for inactive items, text-gray-900 font-bold for active
Apply rounded-xl to cards, shadow-sm for depth
Color palette: bg-gray-50 background, bg-white cards, text-gray-900 headings, text-gray-600 body
NO colored buttons or accents (no blue, green, orange)
Responsive design: sidebar collapses on mobile with Alpine.js toggle

stories.title: Configure landing page and route behavior
stories.description: Set up root route to redirect unauthenticated users to /login and authenticated users to /dashboard, as this is a user system.
acceptance: Route '/' configured in routes/web.php to redirect to /login for guests
Middleware: Route::redirect('/', '/login')->middleware('guest')
Authenticated users accessing '/' redirect to /dashboard
Update RouteServiceProvider HOME constant to '/dashboard'
Remove default welcome.blade.php or keep as placeholder
Test: Unauthenticated visit to '/' → /login
Test: Authenticated visit to '/' → /dashboard

stories.title: Create staff database migration and model
stories.description: Design and implement staff table migration with all required columns for authentication, roles, and tracking.
acceptance: Migration: database/migrations/xxxx_create_staff_table.php
Columns: id, name, email (unique), role (enum: waiter, chef, bartender, manager, admin), phone_number, status (enum: active, inactive), password, remember_token, created_at, updated_at
Model: app/Models/Staff.php extending Authenticatable
Fillable: name, email, role, phone_number, status
Hidden: password, remember_token
Casts: role and status to enums or strings
Relationships: hasMany orders (as waiter_id), hasMany tips (as waiter_id)
Run migration: php artisan migrate

stories.title: Create guests database migration and model
stories.description: Design and implement guests table for customer tracking, loyalty points, and preferences.
acceptance: Migration: database/migrations/xxxx_create_guests_table.php
Columns: id, phone_number (unique), name (nullable), loyalty_points (default 0), preferences (json, nullable), created_at, updated_at
Model: app/Models/Guest.php
Fillable: phone_number, name, loyalty_points, preferences
Casts: preferences to 'array', loyalty_points to 'integer'
Relationships: hasMany orders, hasMany guest_sessions
Index on phone_number for fast lookup
Run migration: php artisan migrate

stories.title: Create tables database migration and model
stories.description: Design and implement tables table for restaurant table management with location, capacity, and status tracking.
acceptance: Migration: database/migrations/xxxx_create_tables_table.php
Columns: id, name, location, capacity (integer), status (enum: available, occupied, reserved), qr_code (nullable), created_at, updated_at
Model: app/Models/Table.php
Fillable: name, location, capacity, status, qr_code
Casts: capacity to 'integer', status to string
Relationships: hasMany orders, hasMany guest_sessions
Default status: 'available'
Run migration: php artisan migrate

stories.title: Create menu categories database migration and model
stories.description: Design and implement menu_categories table for organizing menu items into categories.
acceptance: Migration: database/migrations/xxxx_create_menu_categories_table.php
Columns: id, name, description (nullable), display_order (integer, default 0), status (enum: active, inactive), created_at, updated_at
Model: app/Models/MenuCategory.php
Fillable: name, description, display_order, status
Relationships: hasMany menu_items
Default status: 'active'
Order by: display_order in model default scope
Run migration: php artisan migrate

stories.title: Create menu items database migration and model
stories.description: Design and implement menu_items table with pricing, prep area, availability, and inventory tracking.
acceptance: Migration: database/migrations/xxxx_create_menu_items_table.php

Columns: id, category_id (foreign key), name, description (nullable), price (decimal 8,2), prep_area (enum: kitchen, bar, both), prep_time_minutes (integer), status (enum: available, unavailable), stock_quantity (integer, nullable), low_stock_threshold (integer, nullable), created_at, updated_at
Model: app/Models/MenuItem.php
Fillable: category_id, name, description, price, prep_area, prep_time_minutes, status, stock_quantity, low_stock_threshold
Casts: price to 'decimal:2', prep_time_minutes to 'integer', stock_quantity to 'integer'
Relationships: belongsTo MenuCategory, hasMany order_items
Scope: scopeAvailable() for status='available'
Run migration: php artisan migrate

stories.title: Create orders database migration and model
stories.description: Design and implement orders table as central entity for order management with status workflow and relationships.
acceptance: Migration: database/migrations/xxxx_create_orders_table.php

Columns: id, order_number (unique), table_id (foreign key, nullable), guest_id (foreign key, nullable), waiter_id (foreign key to staff), order_source (enum: pos, whatsapp, web), status (enum: pending, preparing, ready, delivered, paid, cancelled), subtotal (decimal 10,2), tax (decimal 10,2), total (decimal 10,2), special_instructions (text, nullable), created_at, updated_at
Model: app/Models/Order.php
Fillable: order_number, table_id, guest_id, waiter_id, order_source, status, subtotal, tax, total, special_instructions
Casts: subtotal, tax, total to 'decimal:2'
Relationships: belongsTo Table, belongsTo Guest, belongsTo Staff (waiter), hasMany order_items, hasMany payments, hasOne tip
Generate order_number in model boot: 'ORD-' . date('Ymd') . '-' . str_pad(id, 4, '0', STR_PAD_LEFT)
Indexes: order_number, status, created_at
Run migration: php artisan migrate

stories.title: Create order items database migration and model
stories.description: Design and implement order_items table for individual items within orders with quantity, pricing, and prep status.
acceptance: Migration: database/migrations/xxxx_create_order_items_table.php

Columns: id, order_id (foreign key), menu_item_id (foreign key), quantity (integer), unit_price (decimal 8,2), subtotal (decimal 10,2), special_instructions (text, nullable), prep_status (enum: pending, received, preparing, ready), created_at, updated_at
Model: app/Models/OrderItem.php
Fillable: order_id, menu_item_id, quantity, unit_price, subtotal, special_instructions, prep_status
Casts: quantity to 'integer', unit_price to 'decimal:2', subtotal to 'decimal:2'
Relationships: belongsTo Order, belongsTo MenuItem
Calculate subtotal on save: quantity * unit_price
Default prep_status: 'pending'
Run migration: php artisan migrate

stories.title: Create payments database migration and model
stories.description: Design and implement payments table for tracking payment transactions with multiple payment methods and status.
acceptance: Migration: database/migrations/xxxx_create_payments_table.php

Columns: id, order_id (foreign key), payment_method (enum: cash, card, mobile, gateway), amount (decimal 10,2), status (enum: pending, completed, failed, refunded), transaction_id (nullable), gateway_response (json, nullable), created_at, updated_at
Model: app/Models/Payment.php
Fillable: order_id, payment_method, amount, status, transaction_id, gateway_response
Casts: amount to 'decimal:2', gateway_response to 'array'
Relationships: belongsTo Order
Default status: 'pending'
Index on order_id and transaction_id
Run migration: php artisan migrate

stories.title: Create tips database migration and model
stories.description: Design and implement tips table for tracking tips per order and waiter with distribution method.
acceptance: Migration: database/migrations/xxxx_create_tips_table.php
Columns: id, order_id (foreign key), waiter_id (foreign key to staff), amount (decimal 8,2), tip_method (enum: cash, card), created_at, updated_at
Model: app/Models/Tip.php
Fillable: order_id, waiter_id, amount, tip_method
Casts: amount to 'decimal:2'
Relationships: belongsTo Order, belongsTo Staff (waiter)
Index on waiter_id for reporting
Run migration: php artisan migrate

stories.title: Create guest sessions database migration and model
stories.description: Design and implement guest_sessions table for tracking table sessions with QR code access and session management.
acceptance: Migration: database/migrations/xxxx_create_guest_sessions_table.php
Columns: id, table_id (foreign key), guest_id (foreign key, nullable), session_token (unique), started_at (timestamp), ended_at (timestamp, nullable), created_at, updated_at
Model: app/Models/GuestSession.php
Fillable: table_id, guest_id, session_token, started_at, ended_at
Casts: started_at, ended_at to 'datetime'
Relationships: belongsTo Table, belongsTo Guest
Generate session_token in boot: Str::random(32)
Scope: scopeActive() where ended_at is null
Run migration: php artisan migrate

stories.title: Create inventory transactions database migration and model
stories.description: Design and implement inventory_transactions table for tracking stock changes with transaction types and references.
acceptance: Migration: database/migrations/xxxx_create_inventory_transactions_table.php

Columns: id, menu_item_id (foreign key), transaction_type (enum: restock, sale, adjustment, waste), quantity (integer), unit (enum: pieces, kg, liters, ml, grams), reference_id (nullable), notes (text, nullable), created_by (foreign key to staff), created_at, updated_at
Model: app/Models/InventoryTransaction.php
Fillable: menu_item_id, transaction_type, quantity, unit, reference_id, notes, created_by
Casts: quantity to 'integer'
Relationships: belongsTo MenuItem, belongsTo Staff (created_by)
Index on menu_item_id and transaction_type
Run migration: php artisan migrate

stories.title: Setup role-based authorization with policies
stories.description: Implement role-based access control using Laravel policies for Staff model with admin, manager, waiter, chef, and bartender roles.
acceptance: Policy: app/Policies/StaffPolicy.php with viewAny, view, create, update, delete methods
Role checks: admin has all permissions, manager can manage waiters/chefs/bartenders
Gate definitions in AuthServiceProvider for role-specific actions
Middleware: app/Http/Middleware/CheckRole.php for route protection
Apply middleware to routes: Route::middleware(['auth', 'role:admin,manager'])
Helper method in Staff model: hasRole($role) and isAdmin(), isManager()
Test: admin can access all routes, waiter cannot access management pages

stories.title: Setup Laravel Reverb for real-time WebSocket
stories.description: Install and configure Laravel Reverb for real-time broadcasting to Kitchen Display, Bar Display, and Dashboard.
acceptance: Install Reverb: composer require laravel/reverb
Publish config: php artisan reverb:install
Configure .env: BROADCAST_CONNECTION=reverb, REVERB_APP_ID, REVERB_APP_KEY, REVERB_APP_SECRET
Update config/broadcasting.php with reverb connection
Create events: app/Events/OrderCreated.php, app/Events/OrderStatusUpdated.php
Implement ShouldBroadcast on events with broadcastOn() returning channel names
Channel routes: routes/channels.php with auth checks for kitchen, bar, manager channels
Install Laravel Echo and Pusher JS: npm install --save-dev laravel-echo pusher-js
Configure Echo in resources/js/app.js with Reverb settings
Start Reverb server: php artisan reverb:start
Test: dispatch OrderCreated event and verify broadcast

stories.title: Implement QR code generation for tables

acceptance: Install SimpleSoftwareIO/simple-qrcode: composer require simplesoftwareio/simple-qrcode
Service class: app/Services/QRCodeService.php with generateTableQR($tableId) method
QR code data: URL to guest ordering page with session token parameter
URL format: https://domain.com/guest/order?token={session_token}
Generate session token: GuestSession record with table_id, unique session_token
Store QR code: save as PNG in storage/app/public/qrcodes/{table_id}.png
Update Table model: qr_code column stores file path
Display QR in TableManagement component: show QR image in table card
Download QR button: allow managers to download for printing
Regenerate QR button: create new session and QR if needed
Test: scan QR with mobile device, verify redirect to guest ordering page

stories.title: Implement payment gateway integration (Stripe)
stories.description: Integrate Stripe payment gateway for card and mobile payments with transaction tracking and webhook handling.
acceptance: Install Stripe SDK: composer require stripe/stripe-php
Configure .env: STRIPE_PUBLIC_KEY, STRIPE_SECRET_KEY, STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET
Payment service: app/Services/StripePaymentService.php with processPayment($orderId, $amount) method
Create Stripe PaymentIntent when payment_method='gateway' selected
Frontend: add Stripe Elements to payment form (resources/js/stripe.js)
Handle payment confirmation: on success, create Payment record with transaction_id from Stripe
Webhook route: Route::post('/webhooks/stripe', [StripeWebhookController::class, 'handle'])
Webhook signature verification: validate using STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET
Handle webhook events: payment_intent.succeeded, payment_intent.failed
Update Payment status on webhook: completed or failed based on event
Store gateway_response: JSON of Stripe response in Payment.gateway_response
Test mode: use Stripe test keys and test card 4242 4242 4242 4242
Error handling: display user-friendly messages for declined cards

stories.title: Implement order status workflow and validation
stories.description: Create service class for managing order status transitions with business rules and validation to prevent invalid state changes.
acceptance: Service class: app/Services/OrderWorkflowService.php
Method: updateStatus($orderId, $newStatus) with validation
Valid transitions: pending→preparing, preparing→ready, ready→delivered, delivered→paid
Invalid transition prevention: cannot go from delivered back to preparing
Check all items ready: order can only be 'ready' if all order_items prep_status='ready'
Check payment: order can only be 'paid' if total Payments.amount >= Order.total
Update table status: when order paid, set Table.status='available' if no other active orders
Broadcast event: dispatch OrderStatusUpdated event on status change
Notification: send real-time update to kitchen/bar displays when status changes
Audit log: record status changes with timestamp and user_id
Exception handling: throw OrderWorkflowException with descriptive message on invalid transition
Test: verify all valid and invalid transitions, check business rule enforcement

stories.title: Implement automated inventory deduction on order
stories.description: Create event listener to automatically deduct menu item stock when order items are added, with low stock notifications.
acceptance: Event: app/Events/OrderCreated.php (already exists from story 24)
Listener: app/Listeners/DeductInventoryStock.php
Register listener in EventServiceProvider for OrderCreated event
Logic: foreach OrderItem in created Order, deduct MenuItem.stock_quantity by item.quantity
Create InventoryTransaction: transaction_type='sale', reference_id=order_id, quantity (negative)
Low stock check: if stock < low_stock_threshold after deduction, trigger notification
Notification: app/Notifications/LowStockAlert.php sent to managers via database channel
Display notifications: add notification bell icon to app-header.blade.php (monochrome design)
Notification list: dropdown showing unread low stock alerts with item name and current stock
Mark as read: wire:click to mark notification as read
Validation: prevent order creation if stock_quantity < order quantity (out of stock error)
Test: create order, verify stock deduction and transaction creation

stories.title: Create API endpoints for Android POS app (Sanctum)
stories.description: Build RESTful API endpoints for Android POS app with Sanctum authentication for menu, orders, and payments.
acceptance: Install Sanctum: composer require laravel/sanctum (likely already installed with Jetstream)
Publish config: php artisan vendor:publish --provider='Laravel\Sanctum\SanctumServiceProvider'
API routes: routes/api.php with Sanctum auth middleware
Auth endpoints: POST /api/login (email, password) returns token, POST /api/logout revokes token
Menu endpoints: GET /api/menu (categories and items), GET /api/menu/items?category_id=X
Tables endpoints: GET /api/tables, GET /api/tables/{id}
Orders endpoints: POST /api/orders (create order), GET /api/orders (list), GET /api/orders/{id}, PATCH /api/orders/{id}/status
Payments endpoints: POST /api/payments (process payment), GET /api/payments?order_id=X
API Resources: app/Http/Resources/MenuItemResource.php, OrderResource.php, etc. for JSON formatting
Validation: FormRequests for each POST/PATCH endpoint
Rate limiting: apply throttle middleware (60 requests per minute)
API documentation: create routes/api-docs.md with endpoint descriptions, request/response examples
Test: use Postman or Insomnia to test all endpoints with Sanctum token

stories.title: Implement role-based API access control
stories.description: Add role-based middleware to API endpoints ensuring waiters, chefs, bartenders, and managers have appropriate access levels.
acceptance: API middleware: app/Http/Middleware/ApiCheckRole.php extending CheckRole
Apply to API routes: Route::middleware(['auth:sanctum', 'api.role:waiter,manager'])
Waiter access: can create orders, view own orders, process payments
Chef access: can view kitchen orders, update item prep_status (kitchen items only)
Bartender access: can view bar orders, update item prep_status (bar items only)
Manager access: full access to all API endpoints
Admin access: full access including staff management endpoints
Unauthorized response: return 403 JSON with message 'Insufficient permissions'
Token scopes: consider adding Sanctum abilities for granular permissions
Test: authenticate as different roles, verify access restrictions work correctly

stories.title: Implement comprehensive error handling and logging

Log critical errors: OrderWorkflowException, PaymentException, InventoryException to 'critical' channel

stories.title: Implement application performance optimization

acceptance: Eager loading: add with() to relationships in Livewire components (Order::with('orderItems.menuItem', 'table', 'waiter'))

Cache config: configure Redis in .env (CACHE_DRIVER=redis, SESSION_DRIVER=redis)
Cache menu: cache MenuCategory::with('menuItems') for 1 hour, clear on menu update
Cache settings: Setting::get() uses cache, invalidate on Setting::set()
Route caching: php artisan route:cache for production
Config caching: php artisan config:cache
View caching: php artisan view:cache
Asset optimization: npm run build for production (minified CSS/JS)
Image optimization: add intervention/image for menu item images (if implemented)

stories.title: Setup production environment configuration
stories.description: Configure environment for production deployment with security hardening, queue workers, and task scheduling.
acceptance: .env.production: set APP_ENV=production, APP_DEBUG=false, appropriate database credentials
Security: generate new APP_KEY, set secure SESSION_DOMAIN, SANCTUM_STATEFUL_DOMAINS
HTTPS: force HTTPS in production (AppServiceProvider register method)
Queue configuration: set QUEUE_CONNECTION=redis for background jobs
Queue worker: create supervisor config for queue:work --daemon
Scheduler: add cron entry for * * * * * php artisan schedule:run
Scheduled tasks: define in app/Console/Kernel.php (e.g., daily sales summary email)
Storage link: php artisan storage:link for public file access
File permissions: ensure storage and bootstrap/cache writable by web server
Logging: set LOG_CHANNEL=stack, configure mail/slack for critical errors
Reverb production: configure wss:// URL, set REVERB_HOST, REVERB_PORT for production server
Database backup: schedule daily backup (php artisan backup:run if using spatie/laravel-backup)
Documentation: create DEPLOYMENT.md with production setup instructions
